game.title: Eon's Awakening
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, humanity has been plunged into an eternal night. The fabric of reality is torn apart by the cataclysmic event known as "The Great Dissonance." Amidst this chaos, a young woman named Lyra discovers she has the ability to manipulate the remnants of time itself. As she embarks on a perilous quest to unravel the mysteries behind the disaster and restore balance to the world, Lyra must confront ancient beings and other powerful forces vying for control in this desolate landscape.
game.beginning: Lena, the protagonist, awakens from her slumber deep within the ancient ruins of a long-lost civilization with no memory of who she is or how she got there. Guided by an ethereal entity known only as "The Keeper," Lyra embarks on a treacherous journey across the desolate expanse to reclaim fragments of time.
game.ending: With time finally restored and the fabric of reality mended, Lyra stands at the precipice of a new world. As she looks out upon this rekindled landscape, Lyra realizes that her journey has only just begun, for with balance comes the responsibility to protect it. With a newfound sense of purpose, Lyra steps forward into this bright future.
